text: The bartender ( Heavy set guy) was very rude & obnoxious to myself and my friends. I have been going to this bar since it opened 3 years ago, have never had a horrific experience like this before. I have told dozens of my friend not to spend there money at this location a go to SG instead.

I had a great experience here. The music was good, the Service was excellent!!! Hillary was on point and kept the drinks flowing and made every point to check up to ensure superb service. The fried Oreo cookies were insanely good
My friends and I have come here randomly many times over the last few years and have never been disappointed. Love this spot. Great bar, great food, great ambiance.

Mike is really nice whenever we come :)
Foods are amazing and they have many kind of alcohol drinks absolutely.
Price is decent and here is really cool place !

The Bar has a great atmosphere. I especially like their TV's...that's way I was there for the NBA Finals game 7. Service at the bar is good...bartenders are friendly and quick.  Food service not so great...server spilled food all over me and blamed the guy sitting next to me...I had to get up and leave!! Other than that great place to drink and play.

Ordered steaks over the phone for pickup on the way to work. I was a bit skeptical, being that it's a bar and there was only one choice. Service was spot on upon walking in, I was immediately recognized as new, asked what I needed when the first opportunity arose, and made it clear that I was the pickup order. It was checked on at the bartenders first opportunity, and while she was in there, another bartender came to make sure that I was being taken care of. I was told the order would be 2 more minutes, sat down at a table away from the bar to wait, and was approached by the waitress. These girls are on the ball for fast service. Once the food arrived, I went to work and started eating. The steaks were a good cut, cooked as specified, and tasted great. I admit, I did not have high expectations of a good steak there, but this place did not disappoint. If the drinks are made as well as the food, I'd give this place 5 stars. Only reason I did not here was because I wasn't drinking. I imagine if I went there to relax and drink, I'd bump the rating to 5 stars, though. Kudos, ladies.

This place is nice and has great service, food, and atmosphere!  We tried the pretzel bites and tempura asparagus appetizers and both were very good. We'll definitely be back soon!  Keep up the good work guys!

Very friendly service and fantastic food! If you're looking for a good bar to hangout and watch sports and drink beer give these guys a try. There is a shuffleboard table against the back wall to play as well as a couple of dart boards. Just ask the bartender to play either game.

I got a coupon in the mail and since I live right next door to this place, I figured why not I will go check it out. I used to go there when it was bootleg benny's and it was ok.

The bar is very spacious! I like the TV's in there and the staff made you feel comfortable and talked sports with me while I was watching the game. The burger I ordered was very good. I took a prime rib sandwich to go for later that night and it was very good. The portions were very generous also!

The video poker machines gave me play time and it always helps when you get some 4 of a kinds. Overall it's very clean and someplace I would go back to more often.

I love their burgers and service. I have meant to write a review for awhile now. The best part about this place aside from great food is super friendly service that feels like you are walking into the set of "Cheers"! They are always so personable and welcoming;)

There was a small problem with my burger but it was fixed quickly and the food was still really good. The service is great and they have good after dinner coffee. It's not super loud and the set up is good no matter where you sit, I will come back.
Very rude bartenders especially to regulars who spend ALOT of money.  They don't know how to treat people who are loyal and make people uncomfortable.

This place is AWESOME!! It has a great atmosphere at ALL HOURS!! I have been in the company of the cheerful day girls as well as the generous swing shifts 'Happy Hour', into the late night shifts with great energy! As a Woman entering a bar atmosphere alone can be  intimidating, however I have always felt welcomed and safe here. The food has a range from fulfilling large salads, your yummy fried chicken wings to protein diet based plates! It is a tasty well balanced menu. The bar and bathroom are always clean(very important).They also have side seating for groups and multiple games for social entertainment. (Even a private room for special events!!!)  I highly recommend making this your neighborhood gaming and dining bar!!

This place by far is one of the best places you can come to in Las Vegas! The whole staff is amazing and the food isn't your typical bar food. I like the come on grave shift or early in the morning with Amanda. She plays the best music and is so friendly. Eric, Steve, Faryn, Shilo, Amanda, Lindsey... You really can't go wrong on any of their shifts!

Was looking for a new place to go have drinks and food so I tried here. Nice sporting atmosphere. Faryn the bartender was great. Knew the whole menu and I settled for juevos rancheros. I must say it was great. Will be my new neighborhood place to go..

The best bar in spring valley, New management is very nice and professional. Cool atmosphere.
Great food.
Shuffle Board.
Darts with Mandy.
Love this place.

I decided to check out this place solely based on Yelp reviews and I'm so happy that did. Of course since I can walk to it doesn't hurt either. I went in on a Saturday during one of the Final Four games and it was surprisingly slow but still fun nonetheless.

I had the cutest bartender, Faryn. She was so sweet and helpful that I think it's my favorite go to bar in Spring Valley. I only ordered an appetizer which were the pretzel bites with a cheese sauce and a stone ground mustard. I didn't care for the cheese sauce but the stone mustard concoction was delicious. Just writing this review is making me hungry for their food so cya .

 GO THERE NOW!!!

We have been ordering from The Bar on Grand Canyon since they opened. I order a very specific burger cooked a specific way with a specifically cooked egg on top, (yes I know I'm picky,) :) and GC consistently screws it up...  This new location got it SPOT ON!  Literally perfect! Although it is an extra mile or so away, we will definitely be ordering from this location instead...  Thank you so much for making my taste buds dance!!  :)
Great food, awesome staff, and a chill environment. Nick, Chip, Farron(hope I didn't butcher the spelling), And Mandy all make you feel like you've been going there for years. Cheers to The Bar!!

This place smell like an ashtray !!!!
The smell of cigarettes is so bad that 2 min inside and you clothes will smell like you have been in a smoking lounge!!
I came in to eat but I couldn't even drink in this smell it's awful !!
I really can't understand how ppl eat like that when you have a smell of cigarettes all over !

The food was good but one of the staff picked the number off my credit card and attempted to buy $1400 worth of electronics online with it 2 days after visiting. Also not too thrilled that I asked for well tequila and they used Don Julio all night. Expensive stuff!

Been in Vegas permanently for a little over 3 years now and have probably hit every gaming joint in the valley.This is by far my Favorite, Customer service is by the best that I have experienced in Vegas,and the food is phenomenal. The absolute Best bartenders in town Justin & Chippy. LUVTHEBAR    D.W

I enjoy this place. I bring my Father here. We enjoy the food and the atmosphere. The bartenders are friendly and poor a good drink. What ever we order off the menu is always good. I enjoy the Cuban sandwich. Definitely try it. Lots of TV'S to watch the games. Mandy is a fantastic server. She makes my Dad smile and is very attentive.
Place is great. Justin is the man. Great bartender he works grave yard shift Saturday thru Thursday. Go check the place out great food and great drinks!

I ordered the xxx wings, I'm a heat seeker so sadly the heat did nothing for me but that's not a bad thing, as for the flavor it was superb. My girlfriend ordered the blt and gave me a bite I'll be honest you can't got wrong with that ever. The bar is a very enjoyable experience food, 90s music and all.

Nice staff, good (not great) food and decent drinks. Parking lot always looks full, so we went in and the inside was sparse, but it was what we were looking for. Things picked up as the night moved on, Thursday, as all got out of work. One of the staff members told us the lot is full as they permit parking for car poolers. I guess that is a great way to capture the after work crowd. Step up from Remedy's though a step down from Fireside. Both cases are big steps, but this is what the doctor ordered sometimes. We will go back. Music did get a bit loud, as others have noted.

Well this was a pleasant surprise when it opened last year! This bar looks similar to the first 2 locations but is more spacious and full of energy. There are some of the most attentive bartenders here (even in the busiest rushes). You are well taken care of here. Oh, and expect the same high quality "TheBar" signature dishes here too

The Bar has great food, great staff and awesome drinks. The music, however, is awful. All of the crappy 90's music that needs to be forgotten about. This place would be perfect if they could cut out the 90's crap.

The staff is super friendly and the menu is good. Only downside is walking out smelling like a big smoke ball, which happens in a lot of bars since people are chain smoking the entire time they're in there.

Great food omg that i actually crave..... mac n cheese amd wimgs is a must! the service is amazing never dined in but for take out they know me n my husband by our first names highly recommend best neighborhood bars I know!

This bar is a great place to hang out. Everyone makes you feel at home. Shilo is a great bartender and gives you plenty of attention.  Jackpots are popping all the time.  Overall great place to hang out anytime of day plus the food is amazing!

received a  mailer and thought okay let's go. walked in on a Monday afternoon greeted by a bartender wearing a cute  t shirt that said the bar and below that the baby. how cute however never got her name. looked over menu asked what was good she said the club. so ordered it and  yes it is good. had a beer a club on white toast served with fries and watched sport center. really felt at ease there and good music playing. will go back again.

Great food....A must: onion rings
...Buffalo wings...tatchos...truffle mac & cheese. Not so much of a fan of their chicken tortilla soup.  Right price great food. Btw haven't dined in yet. This is all to go!!! Well worth every penny

This is my favorite local bar by far.  We have been in on several shifts (mostly swing) and have always had great service.  The atmosphere and staff are welcoming and it is a great place to unwind.  The food is amazing as well.  We have tried so many things on the menu and it is definitely not your normal "bar food".  Some of the Friday night specials are an extra treat and I personally love the ribs when they have them.  

We have held our fantasy football draft in their party room and was well taken care of also.  I would definitely recommend theBar to anyone looking for a local spot to gamble and relax.

Stopped by after work. This was my first time here, but the night time bar tender was so friendly. He made me feel at home. They have my favorite IPA (lagunitas). Ordered the tempora asparagus to start. It was amazing and the sauce they serve with it is delicious. Ordered a jalapeño burger without mushrooms. It was delicious, one of the best burgers I've had. The bartender was very helpful when ordering and answered all my questions with a smile. Will definitly be back.

What a place for the locals to go to.  I moved here 2 weeks ago and already they know my name and I get great service!  The right game is always on, gorgeous bartenders and Chip is a GM I would want to work for!  The place to go after work is the BAR!!!
Gambled $80 and they charged us for drinks!! Won't be returning. Music and atmosphere pretty blah for a Friday night.

Food and service -great! I enjoyed my tortilla soup and Bloody Mary and hubby loved his rich and delicious quesadillas. We split the sliders and they were yummy too. Fun and festive atmosphere. Music above our table was a little bit loud but that might have been because it was around the holidays when we went. Will be back soon since it's been a while since we went:)

Here on Superbowl Sunday, having an amazingly fun time! Great atmosphere, delicious food and an INCREDIBLE staff making magic and "karate" happen! 
Thank you Eric, Johnny, Shilo, Lindsay, Mandy, H and Crystal for doing an awesome job as always!
You guys rock! 
Chipper we missed you dearly, but know you had an all-star team hustling, with smiles and taking care of business!!!
Love my The Bar GC Crew

Jonny & Lindsey are dope! cool place. close to home which is even better. food is great (I always order the burger or chicken fingers). and they know where my player's card is more often than I do. recommended. especially if you live in the area. been during other shifts and the service was great.

My boyfriend and I stopped by Bar on our way home to grab a quick bite and finish the Memphis game. Not only was the food amazing (I had the 1/2 club and soup of the day which was fideo. My boyfriend had the turkey melt) The avocado on my sandwich was fresh, the bread was soft. The soup was amazing. I love fideo soup and they did a great job. The addition of the diced chicken was nice. My boyfriends fries were crispy and not over salted. Nick was behind the bar and he was so lovely and inviting. His bar back, Juan, was also very welcoming and helpful. All in all, it was a delightful quick lunch and we will absolutely be back. Big thanks to Nick and Juan who took customer service to a great level. The service industry could use more folks like you!
Amanda the Bartender is the best!  Same with Chipper, Waterhouse, Charlie, Nick and Faryn!  One of the best local bars in suburbia Vegas!  Regardless of what anyone says.

This bar is fantastic and the food is amazing. Mini corn dogs are my favorite. The bartenders are all very friendly, but my favorite is Shilo. She always greets us with a smile, and sweet disposition. I highly recommend this location.

Goood beer , great service , hot bartender ladies. 
The food is very good try the jalapeño burger and the chicken fingers they are actually very good. 
The price of everything is great plus you can gample a little also.

Chip, Nick, and Eric make this bar happen. Best kick back spot in the Southwest. The place keeps going way into the wee hours with a friendly  crowd  the whole night. This is not just a gaming bar kick back be sociable.

I have had a wonderful experience every time I come here! 

Amanda the GM is fantastic and our server Hillary last time was so fun and relatable she really made our time there enjoyable. 

I will definitely be back :)
Mike was an amazing bartender and has an uncanny ability for figuring out what you like to drink.

Ok, so this bar is ok nothing great. 
The interior of the the bar is nice and clean the staff is nice. Funky cocktail glasses, I did not like them at all. 
I'm trying to find something nice to say about this place but it's really just other mediocre Las Vegas bar. We've been out looking for a bar to hit weekly and The Bar just doesn't do anything for me at all.

I have been to both the BAR on Las Vegas blvd and the one on St Rose!  The service, food and attention to customers is stellar. The best!  I went to the bar on trop and Durango tonight my daughter had told me not to go because the service is horrible. Needless to say it was! I say ten minutes to get water once my hubby showed another ten minutes to get a drink, bar was slow, not many people!  Ordered food took over half an hour to get fish tacos and a salad!  Wrong salad, bar back told the server it was wrong she never acknowledged just went on chit chatting! Bill came salad was on the bill. Took two and half hours for three beers a salad that was wrong and fish tacos. Sorry but I'll make the drive to St Rose or Las Vegas Blvd!!

Unfortunately, I only go to this location when meeting friends as it isn't very close to me, but I do like it. Nice and friendly staff. 

Last time I was there I noticed that both of the bartenders (blonde called Tinkerbell and a brunette) were actively using customers names. I like that. They also both were very good about keeping our drinks up and checking on us.

Food is always great. My favorite thing is the beef dip sandwich with tots, but the totchos (tot nachos) are also pretty tasty. From what I can tell everything on the menu is yummy!

Great place to meet friends for a drink or watch one of the games.

We had a perfect experience with Hillary as our server. From the moment we sat down; she was on her game 1000000%! She was very friendly, helpful while we were ordering, quick to get us any extras, and she invited us to come back to visit her: we definitely will!

I usually don't go out of my way to post things being that I'm in the industry and I have nothing but love for local bars, but the service tonight was terrible. After working a shift and trying to find a place to grab a bite to eat and enjoy a beverage; I had to wait on my Bartender (Eric) to finish his conversations while leaning to order another drink and food. This is a bad look for a place with great reputation. I've never experienced this with the earlier shift bartenders. Come to find out this is a normal thing.

Vegas has a bar/pub/slot machine place on almost every corner. Some are complete sheet holes and some are great finds

I want to thank my fellow Las Vegas yelpers for reviewing this great find. The Bar@ Trop and Durango is a great place with great service and great food. It is a great place to watch a sports event. They have a lot of beers on tap....good beers!

I had a pint of Newcastle Brown Ale and a pint of Guinness. Actually they have two sizes 16oz and 22 oz..I thought prices were really good.

The food here is actually really good as well. I had the Jalapeño Burger which was really really good. Good meat on a good bun with great toppings:  pepper jack cheese , bacon, guacamole, 1000 island, brioche bun. 

The other bar food looked really good as well!

When I come back next month I will definitely drop in for lunch.
Love the food here. Upscale bar.  Wait staff above average. Love the house salad and tortilla soup. Roast beef sandwich are wonderful
The food is great the staff is friendly and the price is good! I visit weekly and am greeted with a smile every time.
Went for the last 30 minutes of my birthday and it was great! I had some delicious drinks and even more delicious fried Oreos! On top of that the bar tenders were amazing and comped my order so nice!

Great food here. Been here 3 times now and it's never been a disappointment. The service is fast and attentive, the food is delicious. What else could you want for a local bar. The soup of the day is always homemade, don't order the cup, get a bowl. Trust me you'll be glad you did!
Service is good, food is good the chicken wings very small the music was okay tonight average will give them another try another evening

The bartender ( heavy set guy) was very rude to myself and group of friends. I've been to this bar several times since it opened 3 years ago  and have never experience such a horrific time at this location. I will never go back that location and have told a dozens of my friend not to spend money at this location.

What a great place. Gustavo the Chef here makes the best food.  The employees and management are friendly and very attentive.  We have been here numerous times and have never been disappointed.   It will remain one of our most favorite bar / restaurants in Las Vegas.

So far so good.

Prices can be high for a bar. But it's up kept. It's also only 2 months old. 

Bartender knows how to make a drink here as well!

Free potato chips are a tasty treat.  

Food is a little slow on delivery. 

However it's good!

Try the BBQ bacon burger with tater tots!

Over all we will return. Just prepare for slow service.
Hillary Cruz is amazing!  She checked on us several times and took care of us!  We had an amazing time because of her!!!  Thank you Hillary!

I was in last Sunday night for football. I sat and ate with with Hillary then moved over to the bar and were immediately greeted by the bartender Lindsey. I told her I was a beer lover and she went over all the craft beers which is not usually common for local bartenders to know their beers. Both bartenders were very attentive, always made sure   my drinks were full and they were tons of fun and seemed to love their job. Highly recommended. Good food, drinks and great service

Love this place more every time I come here! The food is killer - best sliders & wings in town! Def check out the breakfast too- everything is great!
 Go late night & see Erik the grave bartender - he's AWSM!! Fun Fun time!
Place used to be one of the best bars in town great staff but since new management took over it has quickly turned into a bad place to drink and gamble plus kitchen has taken big step back

I recently found this bar by accident heading to a nail appointment which my lady called to push back from 4pm-5. I saw The Bar so I figured I had over an hour to kill I'd grab something to eat while I waited. When I walked in I noticed a bar full of Tv's which is great for Sunday football (I asked the bartender if they show all the games, and yes they do!) 

When I sat down, I was immediately approached and asked what I'd like to drink and if I cared for a menu. Looking through their menu and I was stumped on what to get, everything sounded so good!! The bartender Amanda (I remembered because That's my name) was super helpful and suggested the edamame as an app and prime rib sandwich, as it's been a staple on their menu. The edamame was so good and the prime rib dip was beyond my expectations. I didn't know a "bar" would have this good of food. 

I must have been in between shifts, because two new bartenders came on and Amanda asked if I needed anything before she left. I said no and shortly after she walked away a blonde bartender Faryn came by to check and see if I needed anything and introduced herself and her coworker Lindsay. I stayed for about 45 Mins until I had to leave and watching these girls mingle around and get to every person who walked in was pretty impressive. This place is very on point. From cleanliness, to delicious eats, and friendly staff, you can expect to see me again, and I'm coming back to try those fried Oreos! Cheers to The Bar!

Shy was my service. Just stop by for a quick meal before I left to Los Angeles, so I was one of the most amazing waitresses I've had for a very long time and I thank her for serving me with great excellent and professional service
Best Gaming Bar by far! Amazing food and even better staff! Love calling this place my home away from home! Keep it up!

There's a first time for everything.  The JW Burrito was absolutely tantalizing.  You must add the Carne Asada for the home run.  The burrito consists of eggs (scrambled) potatoes, bacon, cheese, and fresh salsa.  BOOM!  My mouth is watering just thinking about this burrito.

I had the opportunity to have Eric as my bartender and he treated me like a King.  In fact, I'm still amazed at how good the food is.  Guess what, I haven't touched a drink.

Now the drinks are flowing, what a selection on tap!  I'm an avid craft beer lover.  They happen to have a rotating 3 seasonal beers.  Oktoberfest you say?  Yes!  Do you want an IPA, guess what...they have that too.  

I'm amazed at how good the food is.  If you are looking for drinks and/or food in the area, this is the spot!

One day, after my physical therapy, my mom and I decided to stop in as The Bar is in the same parking lot as the doctor's office... since then we have become frequentors of the graveyard [and sometimes] swing shift. Eric and Mandy are the absolute best! But really, the entire staff, BOH included are top notch. Fun, sweet, and always welcoming :) The food is tasty- we love the tater tots!!- and the drinks are reasonably priced. So glad we found this place!!
Get the shrimp tacos! Amazeballs. And ask for Chip or Nick!

The service here was awesome, all thanks to Hillary. Her service was the best I've experienced in a long time. She went above and beyond my expectations in the service department. I will return just because she made me fill so welcomed.
Swing shift bartenders were very cool. Machines, however, were very tight, like a drum! Did not eat but kitchen on side and menu had a wide variety of options.

Went here for a Sunday night football game to eat & have a few beers. Our server was training another girl, and both were friendly and helpful! The menu so many appetizers that sounded great that I had trouble choosing! We ended up getting the bacon cheddar tots, the chicken quesadillas, and the mac & cheese. All were delicious! I will definitely be back to try the others I didn't get!

We got a coupon in the mail offering $25 in free match play and 25% off the food bill not including alcohol so we thought we'd give it a shot.  I was unaware that "The Bar" was actually a chain in town so I read up on the one by Grand Canyon Drive.  This new location is the closest bar to my house so we had high hopes it would be decent enough to become semi-regulars.  

I had never been to this bar when it was previously Bootleg Benny's but the place was completely redone according a patron I talked to and it definitely shows.  The setup is right up there with an above average video poker bar with a few more choices for food than just wings and burgers.  

Happy hour consisted of $2 Bud Light, Michelob Ultra and well drinks.  I was hoping for some food deals but no dice.  Thanks to Rich W's review of The Bar on Grand Canyon, I got the prime rib sandwich which totally delivered.  Nice juicy slices of prime rib topped with deep fried jalapeno slices and horseradish but the real kicker was how good the bun was.  My wife got the turkey avocado wrap but for some reason they forgot to put in the avocado so they sliced up half of one and brought it on a plate afterwards.  That was tasty as well since the turkey was roasted and cubed instead of just being your run of the mill deli meat.

The machines were also kind enough to bestow a couple of quads to us which took care of our bill.  The TV's were pretty good so I will definitely be back to watch a few games.

Come here a lot to order take out   it's right behind my house and the food is good but today I went in for some lunch  takeout and I dnt know who this Michelle girl was behind the bar but man was she rude first when she is taking my order she kept interrupting me to ask her questions but if she would just had listened I was answering and then she tells me you look hung over ... insult ur customers super smart wich may I add I was not hung over nor do I even drink then when my food comes she just throws it in front of me and walks away tripple knoted the plastic bag wich I fought with to open  then when she finally walks down to my end of the bar I ask her for ranch now this has happened before where I needed more they walkin the back and come right back out but she was back there for a min I dnt even want to think.what was happening to the ranch so I got up and left forget the extra spitty ranch I'll pass needles to say I guess I'll only eat here graveyard like I normally do cus that little girl.needs an attitude check and a serious lesson on customer service skills

It's the BEST...the staff is awesome! From the first time I walked in a couple of years ago to today, the staff at The Bar is the best. From Chip on down to the bar backs! And the food is great! It's my go to bar on the westside anytime of the day, any day of the week!

I can only evaluate the food, and I have to say: it isn't very good. I had the steak, which they cooked completely wrong  (I ordered it medium rare, it came out medium well) and was a flavorless chunk of meat. The accompanying veggies didn't taste fresh, and the stuffed potato tasted like something that came out of a frozen package. 

I realize that probably a majority of folks don't really come here for the food, and I can't comment on the alcohol. The service was helpful and almost gets them 3 stars--basically it is a 2.5 star experience.

Came here to hang out. We asked if they could change one of the tvs to show the bears vs cardinals game but they didn't have the channel. Thought this was strange since they were playing broncos vs 49ers. 
Either way we stayed ordered beer and some food. 
Food was very delicious. Will be coming back to check out the rest of their food menu and possibly call ahead of time if they'll be showing a certain game.

I've always had a pleasant experience whenever I've visited The Bar. I live within walking distance so it's pretty convenient and the pricing is more than reasonable. My most recent experience with Hillary is what hospitality is all about. I've worked in the industry for 10 years and it really doesn't take much to create a pleasant environment for customers. Hillary is pleasant, conversational, positive, and does not overstay her welcome with her guests. Not to mention, she's on top of it and anticipates needs. My friend and I had a great experience overall, but Hillary is the cherry on top.
Best bar with the best bartender, has great food. You will leave here happy and full and have a good time cuz the bartender that works late here is awesome.

A friend hit a Royal for $1000 and invited us to come share a celebratory bevvie!
So we obliged, so as to not be rude!
My first time at this location and it was pretty nice. The decor is Vegas centric and slightly upscale. I had a Not Your Father's Root beer which is a tasty alcoholic version of root beer. The staff were friendly and introduced themselves to us newcomers. I notice that most poker bars do this and it's a nice touch for the most part. Unless you'd rather remain anonymous!
Their menu has a nice variety and we heard a few patrons talking about what food they liked there. There are a few other The Bar outposts located in my neck of the woods so it's unlikely that I'll be frequenting this one.
